slides.title: Dream big
slides.description: Every big win starts the same way: aiming higher than we think is possible and working backward from there.

slides.title: One Brex
slides.description: We focus on what unites us. We optimize for Brex above any individual and leverage the collective genius.

slides.title: Inspire customer love
slides.description: When customers and those around us love what we do and advocate on our behalf, our potential is unbounded.

slides.title: Ownership
slides.description: We take our results personally, and we deliver at the highest standards, with integrity, despite the odds.

slides.title: Growth mindset
slides.description: We have the discipline to seek the truth, humility to know we can improve, and curiosity to learn.

slides.title: Impatient optimism
slides.description: The future will be great, and we want to get there fast. We move with urgency and a positive attitude.
